ResourceHeader.Description: This ASCII file contains values and their uncertainties for 25 abundance ratios of various pairs of chemical elements. The ratios are based on 1978-1981 observations of ~50-500 MeV/n cosmic rays by the U. Chicago cosmic ray experiment on ISEE 3. Each of the ratios is linked in the ASCII file to the publication where its derivation is discussed.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the author(s) of the relevant publication(s) as mentioned above, and acknowledge Mark Wiedenbeck, the ISEE 3 instrument Principal Investigator.

InformationURL.Name: subdirectory holding ISEE 3 cosmic ray data
